target_id.Description: Unique identifier for each target. This column must appear first in the file.

trial_id.Description: Trial number of TMS pulses given.

tms_pos_r1_c1.LongName: Row 1 column 1 of affine transformation matrix describing coil position
tms_pos_r1_c1.Description: Corresponds to the [1,1] row/column position in the affine transformation matrix describing coil position.

tms_pos_r1_c2.LongName: Row 1 column 2 of affine transformation matrix describing coil position
tms_pos_r1_c2.Description: Corresponds to the [1,2] row/column position in the affine transformation matrix describing coil position.

tms_pos_r1_c3.LongName: Row 1 column 3 of affine transformation matrix describing coil position
tms_pos_r1_c3.Description: Corresponds to the [1,3] row/column position in the affine transformation matrix describing coil position.

tms_pos_r1_c4.LongName: Row 1 column 4 of affine transformation matrix describing coil position
tms_pos_r1_c4.Description: Corresponds to the [1,4] row/column position in the affine transformation matrix describing coil position.

tms_pos_r2_c1.LongName: Row 2 column 1 of affine transformation matrix describing coil position
tms_pos_r2_c1.Description: Corresponds to the [2,1] row/column position in the affine transformation matrix describing coil position.

tms_pos_r2_c2.LongName: Row 2 column 2 of affine transformation matrix describing coil position
tms_pos_r2_c2.Description: Corresponds to the [2,2] row/column position in the affine transformation matrix describing coil position.

tms_pos_r2_c3.LongName: Row 2 column 3 of affine transformation matrix describing coil position
tms_pos_r2_c3.Description: Corresponds to the [2,3] row/column position in the affine transformation matrix describing coil position.

tms_pos_r2_c4.LongName: Row 2 column 4 of affine transformation matrix describing coil position
tms_pos_r2_c4.Description: Corresponds to the [2,4] row/column position in the affine transformation matrix describing coil position.

tms_pos_r3_c1.LongName: Row 3 column 1 of affine transformation matrix describing coil position
tms_pos_r3_c1.Description: Corresponds to the [3,1] row/column position in the affine transformation matrix describing coil position.

tms_pos_r3_c2.LongName: Row 3 column 2 of affine transformation matrix describing coil position
tms_pos_r3_c2.Description: Corresponds to the [3,2] row/column position in the affine transformation matrix describing coil position.

tms_pos_r3_c3.LongName: Row 3 column 3 of affine transformation matrix describing coil position
tms_pos_r3_c3.Description: Corresponds to the [3,3] row/column position in the affine transformation matrix describing coil position.

tms_pos_r3_c4.LongName: Row 3 column 4 of affine transformation matrix describing coil position
tms_pos_r3_c4.Description: Corresponds to the [3,4] row/column position in the affine transformation matrix describing coil position.

tms_pos_r4_c1.LongName: Row 4 column 1 of affine transformation matrix describing coil position

tms_pos_r4_c2.LongName: Row 4 column 2 of affine transformation matrix describing coil position

tms_pos_r4_c3.LongName: Row 4 column 3 of affine transformation matrix describing coil position
